title: Ep. 141 - Barbarian's Choice by Ruby Dixon with Melody and Dani
itunes:title: Ep. 141 - Barbarian's Choice by Ruby Dixon with Melody and Dani
description:
Hey HBs! We've got Barbarian's Choice here for you from The Ice Planet Podcast! Melody and Dani recap the all-alien book in which we get to see Farli, whom we've known since she was a teen, get her HEA!! We learn a ton about Sa-khui anatomy, more about the big wide universe, body modification (AKA dick piercing!), and so much more! 
 Make sure to check out the rest of the Ice Planet Podcast and Dani's main project, https://blackchicklit.com/podcast/ (Black Chick Lit)! If you want something close to Heaving Bosoms for your first experience, check out their 2-part coverage of Addicted by Zane (starts at episode 25!) and I also loved  Episode 38 on My Sister, The Serial Killer by Oyinkan Braithwaite. 
 And follow them on twitter @iceplanetpod and https://twitter.com/blackchicklit (@blackchicklit)!
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
